    This class is used in multiple tests.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean sleeping
      The sleeping thread does not return until this becomes false.
      private boolean wake
      If true, the next thread to call rendezvous should wake all sleeping threads.

      • rendezvous

        public void rendezvous()
                throws RMIException
        Description copied from interface: TestInterface
        Permits two threads to rendzevous with control inside the server.

        The first thread to call this method blocks until a second method wakes it.

        Specified by:
        rendezvous in interface TestInterface
        Throws:
        RMIException - If the call cannot be complete due to a network error.
